The game is interesting you need to play with survivor and killer. Hackers never saw in my life.
9/10

Es ist einfach ein geiles Game. Jeder hat zwar seine eigene Meinung aber bei mir kommt das spiel echt gut vor und kann es so auch weiter empfehlen. Das spiel ist sehr intensiv im Thema Horror, aber nach einer Zeit erschreckt man sich nicht mehr so oft.

Buggato come pochi giochi,
giocatori mega tossici in ogni game, 
presenza di cheater occasionali che non vengono bannati,
sbilanciatissimo, 
perk completamente sbroccati sia survivor side che killer side, 
ottimizzato male

Giocato solo perchÃ© unico nel suo genere (tutti i competitors hanno fatto peggio e dio solo sa come sia possibile)

Amazing game you' ll definitely enjoy running away from different killers on different maps, or chasing fellow survivors. I'd definitely recommend you to buy this game 'cause once you start playing it, I bet that you ain't gonna stop playing it. Developers really care about their game and listen to the fans... altrough some people don't respect it as much as they should.... 
There ain't no other game like this one... It's really unique and you should definitely try it.

Dead by Daylight - game of thousands weird words from players and positive emotions. In my opinion dead by daylight the worst game what game have I ever played i love her. But still it is worth noting that sometimes I come across moments with bugs, ping and lags plus toxic peoples The game is interesting but not for an amateur and in fact, many may get tired of playing because of the same.
There would be fewer toxic people it would be much better.

This is a game I gravitate towards playing every fall/Halloween season. Great variety of killers and survivors. Usually a DLC comes out with a killer I am a fan of brings me back to play for a bit such as Michael, Freddy, Pinhead, etc. 

It is a good game to play casually but there is a ranking system so there are the occasional sweaties and even toxic players but it is what it is.

Overall, fun and entertaining

very addictive. only wished the main menu layout of the game was more practical. And the loading screens are boring, they could use their official art work. But the game is amazing, very fun!! Even if you are playing solo queue. xD ggs

This game is soul sucking. Devs don't care, community is shit, the game is only playable as a 4 man swf due to balancing issues, the list goes on and on. Yeah it's fun, yeah you'll have some great moments but the rest is God-awful. Lobbies take between 5-15 minutes, and that's if you're lucky enough to get into one without the game crashing. If you crash in-game, you get a DC penalty. If you lag, you take hits that shouldn't have landed. The grind is insane. Over 200 perks and mostly DLC characters and to level just one of them to get tier 3 perks takes well over 20 games, if you're lucky enough to get that much BP. With bugs that tank maps for 3 months to totems you can't cleanse to pallets you can't break, this game is more frustrating if you want to play seriously. Good if you want to fuck around with friends, but killers and randoms get salty, so maybe not.

Best way I can describe Dead by Daylight.
The game mechanics wise, its one of the best online games of "Hide and seek".
with the added twist of the people are trying to escape from a serial killer, some of which are from some favourite slasher films.
Always keep that in mind when playing online against your fellow "randoms". best played with a bunch of friends or have a quick time murdering family to take the stress out of the day.
Everyone plays games different and will most likely have a different agenda on the list than yourself. always keep mindful when playing against and or with randoms. Sometimes the public matchmaking can be very broken at times pairing high rank vs low rank visa versas.

Each trial a different experience and either you have fun or get pissed off sometimes. It is much more enjoyable if played with friends. I highly recommend it!
Uma experiÃªncia diferente a cada partida, sendo que ou vocÃª se diverte ou atÃ© mesmo se irrita algumas vezes. Se jogado com amigos, Ã© muito mais proveitoso. Recomendo demais!

It's a fun game but not great for casual play. The new MMR system has brought out very tacky killer tactics. Extra servings of camping and tunneling. Since the new system bases your rank off of whether you die, escape, or how many kills you get. You would think it would be based off of the 4 categories that your blood points are generated from each match and how well you do in each of those. But don't let my post prevent you from playing. If you want to play this non stop and get really good at it then go for it. I don't have the time to place into it like i used to.
Fun game, even more fun with friends. Watch out for fast killers :(
